about_the_game:
What is Guardians: A Wardens Tale?

Guardians: A Wardens Tale is an RPG, Monster Tamer, Dungeon Crawler. Travel from town to town to complete quests. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

About the Guardians:

The Guardians are animals who have been touched by the Elements. Each Guardian has a 4 of 11 Skill Trees used to boost Stats, gain new moves and evolve. Some Guardians have even ascended to the status of "Alpha" where they may defend or terrorize the guardian population

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

About the Wardens:

Wardens are a Group of people who have decided to go on dangerous adventures to help the local citizens with tasks they cannot complete. Wardens build bonds with Guardians and bring them along to help them with the challenges ahead.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

About Dungeons:

Each "Dungeon" is a dangerous nature zone that gradually grows in size. They are the main focal point of the game. Each dungeon is randomly generated.

name: Guardians: A Wardens Tale
short_description: Guardians: A Wardens Tale is a Monster Taming/Dungeon crawling game. Progress through dungeons in each town to help the locals. Fight other Guardian tamers and Alpha Guardians in Active Time Battles with your team of 5.
